pr_title: CDPCP-1941. Only trigger user sync role refresh when needed

timeline.bodyText: setAzureCloudIdentityMapping is already a big method, could you refactor this part into a separate one, like refreshRoleIfStale
timeline.author: lacikaaa

timeline.message:
CDPCP-1941. Only trigger user sync role refresh when needed

After setting role configs related to identity mapping, we no
longer trigger refresh when the values haven't changed (by
checking whether CM reports whether a refresh is required).
